name: Cherrim
author: Midori Harada
flavor_text: If it senses strong sunlight, it opens its folded petals to absorb the sun’s rays with its whole body.

poke_body.name: Cloudy Sky
poke_body.effect: If any of your {G} Pokémon or {R} Pokémon would be damaged by an attack, reduce that damage by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Worry Seed
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
